ygData.subject: Re: Runes in stores
ygData.msgSnippet: Definitely try to buy them from players first... I usually pick them up from the other classes for about 2pp ea. You can also trade words and such with the
ygData.messageBody:
Definitely try to buy them from players first... I usually pick them up from
the other classes for about 2pp ea. You can also trade words and such with
the other casting classes for the runes they find...


Cinius Shade(Mith Marr)

> From: Donald Taber <dtaber@...>
>
> On a couple occasions I have seen runes for sale in stores for about 12
> plat. This seems high, but since they are hard to find, should I be
> picking them up? I have a reasonable amount of plat (10-20), but never
> enough where 12 is cheap.
>
> Soren
> Wizard Level 14
>
>
